name: Oxygen Forensics Extractor Backup
summary: An OFB file is a backup file created by Oxygen Forensics Extractor, an application used to extract information from mobile devices. It contains data, such as messages, passwords, photos, and videos, extracted from an Android or iOS device. Federal agencies and law enforcement primarily use Oxygen Forensics software to collect digital evidence.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
